creator: spage@macromedia.com
text:
If you download jakarta-ant-1.3-bin.tar.gz  and attempt to use ant's built-in 
style task, you will get undefined class errors for TraxLiason or XalanLiaison.
These classes are in $ANT_HOME/lib/optional.jar, but the binary ant distribution 
does not include this jar file.

Furthermore, nowhere does the ant documentation say that "optional.jar" is 
actually required for the style built-in task.  Probably both installation and 
"Library Dependencies" at 
http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/install.html#librarydependencies should 
mention this.  I'll file separately.

You are right, optional.jar is not part of the binary distribution and this is
stated in the README file you find in the distribution directory.

You will also want to pick up the jakarta-ant-1.3-optional.jar that con be found
in the same place as the ant distribution itself.
